Where we use it

We use Percona Server and Percona XtraDB to link the network services together. Each network service location has at least one of these.

Why we use it

Percona is basically a very tricked out version of MySQL that allows for high performance and many multi master replication. Percona is still ACID complaint.

Notes

There are other alternatives that can be used here, but they all have trade offs. Anything that can be considered as a replacement needs to be ACID compliant and support multi master replication.
